  dateEcheance: invoice.date_echeance,
  montantHt: invoice.montant_ht,
  montantTtc: invoice.montant_ttc,

  description: invoice.description,
  modePaiement: invoice.mode_paiement,

  updatedAt: invoice.updated_at
